alert.note: Alert for Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 8:33PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morgan, northwestern Johnson, southeastern Rowan and Elliott Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 833 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandy Hook, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Culver and Moon around 840 PM EDT. Relief around 845 PM EDT. Keaton, Gillem Branch, Redbush and Elna around 850 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Barnrock, Flatgap, Winifred, Chandlerville, Sip and Kerz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
